name: The last romance
description:
My entry to Ludum Dare 41.

Controls:

1, 2, 3 and 4 - For options.

A and D - To move horizontal. (No implemented actions)

Space - Gift. (No implemented action)

Quizz, Fight, Turn-based xD.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/$85207

If you like or not comment please.
